content: Elder Jinchi is an optional secret Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in a secret realm locked away in the past, you'll need to activate three bells in order to locate and defeat him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Jinchi.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Jinchi'.
The content is as follows:
Elder Jinchi is an optional secret Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in a secret realm locked away in the past, you'll need to activate three bells in order to locate and defeat him.
